creditline: Gift of Fay M. Gallus and Richard M. Sweet
description: image of a large scale dam under construction; at R is dam wall; at L is a blocky building; several construction cranes at C; lines converge at vanishing point at C of image
medium: Chromogenic print on digital photo paper
signed: on artist label, mount verso BR: Edward Burtynsky
text: Mia has a celebrated collection of photography with particular strength in the twentieth century. The quality and rarity of the works within this gift from collectors Fay Gallus and Richard Sweet further strengthen Mia’s holdings in key areas, especially with regard to specific, canonical photographic artists. Objects of particular interest include a rare photographic calling card created by Carleton Watkins, a signed vintage portrait of James Agee by Walker Evans, a wild photographic assemblage by Weegee, and a remarkable early twentieth century print of Paris by Eugene Atget. When taken together, the Gallus-Sweet gift comprises one of the most consequential gifts of photography to enter the collection in the last decade, and expands our capacity for future research and display of the history of photography across the globe.
title: Three Gorges Dam Project, Dam #4, Yangtze River, China
